thig1.1:1.0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
thig1.1:1.2: wrapped in the cloth you sewed yourself;
thig1.1:1.3: for your desire has been quelled,
thig1.1:1.4: like vegetables boiled dry in a pot.
thig1.1:2.1: That is how this verse was recited by a certain unnamed nun.
